mapper.sql: USER_ID, USER_NAME, MOBILE, USER_STATE, PASSWD, REG_GPSY, REG_GPSX, REG_EAREA, VIP, REG_TIME, cid, cid_time, login_time, online
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from t_user
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into t_user (USER_ID, USER_NAME, MOBILE, USER_STATE, PASSWD, REG_GPSY, REG_GPSX, REG_EAREA, VIP, REG_TIME, cid, cid_time, login_time, online) values (#{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{passwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{regGpsy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{regGpsx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{regEarea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vip,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{regTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{cid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cidTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{loginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{online,jdbcType=INTEGER})

update t_user
USER_ID = #{record.userId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
USER_NAME = #{record.userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MOBILE = #{record.mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USER_STATE = #{record.userState,jdbcType=INTEGER},

update t_user
USER_NAME = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MOBILE = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USER_STATE = #{userState,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PASSWD = #{passwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REG_GPSY = #{regGpsy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
